The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not turn out well – they’ve been feeding with some unknown beast and have turned into cannibals themselves. It’s normal to search for things like oil and treasure in deserts, but bones are something hard to agree on.
